name: NewsUpdater
0:
”Alexa, ask News Updater to get business news updates”
”Alexa, ask News Updater to get sports news updates”
”Alexa, ask News Updater for entertainment news updates”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: news updater
des:
Brings to you quickly the top five news updates from different categories. The categories available are - Business, Technology, Sports, Entertainment, General.

Helps you to stay in touch with the top news of the day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
